name: somnambulate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to walk around while sleeping: These patients may somnambulate or become confused or agitated while apparently sleeping. He somnambulated on several occasions and once climbed on to a veranda roof at night. Synonym
sleepwalk
More examplesFewer examplesI thought I must have been somnambulating again.I take several naps a day, and much of the rest of the time I feel I'm somnambulating.At night sometimes I hear her, somnambulating from room to room.
